solution_line_template: The total number of episodes in the series is {episodes_per_season} episodes per season* {num_seasons} seasons = <<{episodes_per_season}*{num_seasons}={total_episodes}>>{total_episodes} episodes
He watches {fraction_watched} of the series, {fraction_watched}*{total_episodes} = <<{fraction_watched}*{total_episodes}={episodes_watched}>>{episodes_watched} episodes.
A total of {total_episodes}-{episodes_watched} = <<{total_episodes}-{episodes_watched}={episodes_remaining}>>{episodes_remaining} episodes were remaining for Cesar to finish the series
